bBaseColorMap: Whether to generate a texture for the Base Color property
bNormalMap: Whether to generate a texture for the World Normal property
bPackedMRSMap: Whether to generate a packed texture with Metallic, Roughness and Specular properties
bMetallicMap: Whether to generate a texture for the Metallic property
bRoughnessMap: Whether to generate a texture for the Roughness property
bSpecularMap: Whether to generate a texture for the Specular property
bEmissiveMap: Whether to generate a texture for the Emissive property
bOpacityMap: Whether to generate a texture for the Opacity property
bSubsurfaceColorMap: Whether to generate a texture for the SubsurfaceColor property
bAntiAliasing: Whether to use anti-aliasing in the render captures, this may introduce artefacts if pixels at different scene depths get blended
